item.title: Zero downtime deployment with Azure Container Apps and Github Actions - Part 1
item.description: Introduction # As you may know, Azure Container Apps went out of preview during Microsoft Build in late May this year.

item.title: Create Azure Container Apps with terraform
item.description: Microsoft announced at Microsoft Build that Azure Container Apps are now generally available (GA).
